@method: ## only appadmin has access to deleted lotolists
set: this also ensures deleted loto lists won't popup in standard reports

@method: ## modify/add when required and incomment if this customer used wrong pbs mappings before that we now need to correct

set: UPDATE IBANX_VALUE_ITEM SET GROUP_NAME = 'TAG' WHERE GROUP_NAME='FUNC_LEV_FOUR'
UPDATE IBANX_VALUE_LIST SET GROUP_NAME = 'TAG' WHERE GROUP_NAME='FUNC_LEV_FOUR'

@method: ## OR if they really use equipment numbers on permits etc ...

set: UPDATE IBANX_VALUE_ITEM SET GROUP_NAME = 'EQUIPMENT' WHERE GROUP_NAME='TAG'
UPDATE IBANX_VALUE_LIST SET GROUP_NAME = 'EQUIPMENT' WHERE GROUP_NAME='TAG'
